query:
-- First, create or update a lifetime free plan
INSERT INTO subscription_plans (name, description, price, duration_days, features, max_regions, max_products, notification_channels, is_active, created_at)
VALUES (
  'Lifetime Free',
  'Lifetime free access for owner - unlimited features',
  '0',
  36500,
  '["unlimited_regions","unlimited_products","email_notifications","push_notifications","priority_support"]',
  999,
  999,
  '["email","push"]',
  1,
  NOW()
)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
  description = 'Lifetime free access for owner - unlimited features',
  max_regions = 999,
  max_products = 999,
  is_active = 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2LSjgciXE5U7gJN.root --database AE5tzfuADY2nWPRKhfHJC3 --execute
